PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-22031999-12-160,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
PrecisRegulations Amending the NOTIFIABLE TRANSACTIONS REGULATIONS in such a way as to allow businesses to quickly determine (a) the information that must be provided to the Competition Bureau, (b) whether or not they can benefit from the exemption for asset securitization transactions, and (c) how to convert assets and revenues reported in foreign currencies into Canadian dollars.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0008 Publication Date: 2000-01-05
